Review.Titre: I paid $6.52 just to get $5 credit
Review.Contenu: I paid $6.52 just to get $5 credit? Why am I, as an iPhone user, has to eat the Apple tax? It doesn't make any sense.

Review.Titre: I am not able to call any number in China on May 29th and 30th with numerous attempts
Review.Contenu: I am not able to call any number in China since May 29th Monday. I attempted numerous times on May 29th and 30th. I called a few numbers in China, including fixed line and mobile. It always rang once then disconnected. I also tried different access number including Sydney, Melbourne, and Brisbane, all having same issue.I had this issue a few weeks ago and reported to customer support. I was told it's one-off but it seems recurring.I have been with DianhuaChina.com for many years. If this problem persists and I am not able to make overseas calls when needed, I have to ask for refund of remaining credit and find another service provider.

Review.Titre: Sorry guys second time using to call…
Review.Contenu: Sorry guys second time using to call China. Both times could not reach number. Thought they used a terminal in China to call Chinese numbers but no it's like dialing yourself direct and china blocks calls says number invalid. Have tried more than 1 number same message. Will have to try different service.

Review.Titre: I’ve been using your device to phone my…
Review.Contenu: I’ve been using your device to phone my wife in China  and  so far it’s terrible I only got through  twice in over a hundred call attempts.  I’m so very unhappy with this service    Why doesn’t this work ????  I think I’ll try another service how do I stopPaying for this terrible service.

Review.Titre: The person I talked to for assistance…
Review.Contenu: The person I talked to for assistance was out right rude.
The rate has become too pricy. I won't use it as much, if at all, in the future.

Review.Titre: It is very easy to get disconnected
Review.Contenu: It is very easy to get disconnected. The signal is not stable. I am thinking about canceling the service
I cannot login my account.Always show offline
Bad, no reason, the rate goes up
The service frequently went down.  Could not make a call at all.

Review.Titre: Spent £20 on a Voice  credit yesterday…
Review.Contenu: Spent £20 on a Voice  credit yesterday But it just does not work although I followed all the instructions. There is no phone no anywhere on their site to call for help just a load of standard questions and answers, Very disapointed. If they want to call me my mobile is 07910871412 - they have my landline - Leonard Havard, Glasgow UK.

Review.Titre: I’ve tried many many times to phone my…
Review.Contenu: I’ve tried many many times to phone my friends in China and I can’t get through.  Is the phone system broken.  Even trying the operator assistance didn’t work  please tell me how can I phone China.  I did everything the websites ask with all the right numbers but no luck.  Jerry.

I used to be very happy with this but recently the phone  became disconnected from time to time although there are still enough  minutes left ( more than 700 minutes ) . It is really very annoying when you are talking to your families in the middle of the conversation when all of sudden the phone became disconnected !

Review.Titre: Unable to make call with 1000 minutes voice credits
Review.Contenu: I  just created an account in their website with my email and phone number and paid 10 bucks to have bought 1000 minutes voice credits, and received the pin number which was good. Then I tried to use it to make calls to China, but it blocked my call by saying that I do not have enough money to make a call and forcing me to add money. There is no support phone number to call to get my issue fixed. How ridiculous this company is running business like this !  I am stuck in the dark and no avail.

bad.I have a balance $0.47 (0.5 hour times left), but I can not have a normal use to make a call, which mean have to use a toll number call and pay triple price rather than a normal rate. Who oversee DianhuaChina.com?Jack

Review.Titre: after 3 times the pin no longer valid
Review.Contenu: I bought $20 in June 29/2021, and only used 3 times.  Last time I still have $19, but yesterday the pin is not valid any more.  I don’t have my order number, I only record the pin is 0767074514 .

Review.Titre: I bought the monthly subscription for…
Review.Contenu: I bought the monthly subscription for $5 a month. The calls worked fine the first month, second month in the receiver in China can no longer hear me. I don't know why it's not working.

I just don’t think your team know how to handle issues. My parents couldn’t call China, I thought maybe my renew system didn’t work, instead checking my account I just go ahead bought the plan again. But this note I have received from your team. Just $5 not a big deal, the plan was for my parents, but the way how you guys handle the issue, it is just so disappointed!!!“Thank you for contacting our Support Team.We have checked your account and we could see that your last Monthly Plan that had a renewal date of 06/25/2021 has been canceled and you purchased a new Monthly plan on 06/19/2021. Unfortunately, since the old plan has been canceled, we will not be able to activate it again. We suggest you continue with the Monthly Plan purchased today which has a renewal date of 07/19/2021.We appreciate your patience.”

I am very disappointed with DianhuaChina.com.  I have been on here two years and have never completed one phone call.  Always get can not connect the call message.  I am about to go and try another provider.

Review.Titre: The quality of sound is not good
Review.Contenu: The quality of sound is not good. It is pretty bad actually. Last time, I was told they have changed something, but it is not working. The quality is still bad.

Review.Titre: not good in customer serive. can not find the phone number  for customer sericee
Review.Contenu: not good. look for hours can not find the phone number  for customer service.  It was there before. but not any more. Bad service.

Review.Titre: Tool 2 hours to post credit and they overcharged me
Review.Contenu: They charged me way more then the current exchange rate and it took my multiple contact until they sent the credit to my phone

Review.Titre: I can never make a phone call to China…
Review.Contenu: I can never make a phone call to China through your service this year!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Review.Titre: Automatically added me to the monthly…
Review.Contenu: Automatically added me to the monthly plan and charged me every month without me noticing it.
vary bad network, tried so many times it's not working to call international

Review.Titre: Can not connect calls I would like my …
Review.Contenu: Can not connect calls I would like my money back or correct everything

Review.Titre: sometimes call China it's not smooth…
Review.Contenu: sometimes call China it's not smooth 20% &miss translate
Sorry, but have yet to complete a call through your service.

Review.Titre: No easy way to stop the plan online…
Review.Contenu: No easy way to stop the plan online when not needed.

Review.Titre: Only got 3G connection in Sweden for the eSIM I purchased and the connection was not stable. Very disappointing experience.
Review.Contenu: Only got 3G connection

Often we have connection issues.  The person on the other end can't hear, calls can't go through, dropped calls, messages that state we don't have enough credits even though we have an unlimited plan etc... We are currently searching for another long distance carrier.

Not sure what has changed, but recently the calls seem to drop out more frequently than ever before. Further, the call receiver's phone indicates that the call comes from all kind of countries, except from Australia???

Review.Titre: I just bought voice credit on in-app…
Review.Contenu: I just bought voice credit on in-app purchase. It is 6.16 but was charged 9.16 from Apple Pay. I was not reminded of extra charge when $6 was pop up. it is weird!!!!

Review.Titre: After I made several calls to China
Review.Contenu: After I made several calls to China, then it won't let me to make more calls to China, but I still have $6.39 which has 700min left for calling to China. So why it won't let me call anymore?? It is so inconvenient. The worse thing that there no customer Service where I can talk this issue!

I just purchased $20. I immediately called to China. But the calling had a problem that I could only hear from the other side, but the other side could not hear me. I hung up and dialed again. The same problem happened again.I had another problem before that it pauses constantly during my calling. Later it had been better for a while. But now this problem rises up again!!

Review.Titre: I couldn't hear the voice of the other party
Review.Contenu: Recently, when I made a call to China, I could not hear the voice of the other party after it was connected. I need to hang up and call again. At least 5 and 6 times before I can hear the voice of the other party, and the fee of $0.01 will be deducted for each recall.

Review.Titre: The call cannot be put through
Review.Contenu: Multiple times I've tried to call a couple different numbers in China, to hear the operator telling me the call cannot be put through.

Review.Titre: After I made calls and tried to call…
Review.Contenu: After I made calls and tried to call another #, but it says it is invalid which I still have $7.39 left to call China (about 700 min left). It is so inconvenience!

Review.Titre: the quality of call not as good as before
Review.Contenu: The call was always disconnected after talking more than 15 min. or have a lot of noise when talking...not as good as before

Review.Titre: The rate keeps increasing and it is…
Review.Contenu: The rate keeps increasing and it is already 250% of the rate in 2022.
There is a great jumping up of the rate, from 1 cent/min to 2.5 cent/min. This is not reasonable!

Review.Titre: The phone was often disconnected during…
Review.Contenu: The phone was often disconnected during the conversation. The app interface is great

I have been a customer for sometime, but over the past few months when I was calling China and the signal was very bad and I got lots of compaints that they could not hear me. Your company really need to improve the quality of the phone call.The number I am calling that gives me these connection issues is (201) 539-2404

Review.Titre: I prefer a service that I can purchase…
Review.Contenu: I prefer a service that I can purchase minutes when I need them not monthly even if I had only used 5 miles.  Pay $2,88 even if I only need 5 minutes.   I would give you 5 stars if I could purchase minutes only when I need them.

Review.Titre: Connections are not difficult but most…
Review.Contenu: Connections are not difficult but most of the calls to Beijing are not satisfactory due to intermittent low sound volumes which interruptes the conversation.Hopw you will find a way to improve.

Review.Titre: Sometimes there is a lot of noise in…
Review.Contenu: Sometimes there is a lot of noise in the call

Review.Titre: Service is unsatisfactory, Customer service is adequate
Review.Contenu: Have not successfully placed a single call in nearly 2 months to China.Very dissatisfied with the service.  Customer service has been reasonably efficient, but no results as yet.

Review.Titre: the service is not as good as before
Review.Contenu: the service is not as good as before. it will defuct time even thought the call did not get through and the connection is not stable.

Review.Titre: The calls automatically gets cut off…
Review.Contenu: The calls automatically gets cut off after couple hours.  I have reached out to customer service few times and nothing can be done.
I have to try a couple of time to make the phone call work. and my parents complaint about the phone volume pretty low.
it can be suddenly disconnected sometimes while making phone calls

Review.Titre: Quite bad connection almost every time
Review.Contenu: Quite bad connection almost every time. System not efficient.

Review.Titre: a lot of noise and sound are not clear…
Review.Contenu: a lot of noise and sound are not clear compare with Weichat

Review.Contenu: please stop changing the Call History format

Review.Titre: happy to use this phone card  to call…
Review.Contenu: happy to use this phone card  to call China
Bad connection. Calls always get dropped.

Review.Titre: The call quality is not good

Review.Contenu: signal is quite unstable.

I used to like the service and gave it a five star. But recently there was a rate hike from 1 cent a minute to 2.5 cent a minute and this was a huge increase. The quality of the call also seems not as good as before.

Review.Titre: We are happy with the monthly fee but…
Review.Contenu: We are happy with the monthly fee but the connections still keep dropping out and we have to redial. Sometimes this happens 3 or more times during a single call.You told us that you tried to fix this issue but unfortunately it still keeps happening.

Review.Titre: The price will be increased to 2.5…
Review.Contenu: The price will be increased to 2.5 cents/min from 6/27/2023. I may consider to move to google call which is 2 cents per minutes. I make a lot of calls to China. Currently I use both of them with no problem. Thanks!

Review.Titre: It’s so often that a call can’t get…
Review.Contenu: It’s so often that a call can’t get through and the operator’s recorded reply is “ Nobody is available to receive your call now, please call later.” Actually the receiver’s phone did not ring at all, which means the call didn’t get through, for this I have contacted my sister a couple of times asking her why she didn’t receive my call and she said “ My mobile phone did not ring at all and I’m staying at home all the time, the phone is always with me...”  Another problem is the conversation  over the phone was disconnected without any reason or explanation.

Review.Titre: using dianhuachina phone card to call…
Review.Contenu: using dianhuachina phone card to call china cellphone number seems unstable. The call quality is sometimes good, and sometimes bad.

Review.Titre: 50% plus In-app dials failed and I had…
Review.Contenu: 50% plus In-app dials failed and I had to redial till it got connected.

Review.Titre: The connection always breaks when I was…
Review.Contenu: The connection always breaks when I was talking to my family. I have to dial everything again
Calling quality is not good. Used to be good. Now call quality is degraded. Have to make a few calls to connect.

Review.Titre: Re-charge and use is very easy
Review.Contenu: Re-charge and use is very easy. Great to be transportable and useful at other places than home via Mobile App. Only disappointment is that I get charged an additional INTERNATIONAL PAYMENT FEE.Other downside is that call got disconnected many times after a few seconds or couple of minutes for no reason - which still results in full Minute Charge and have to dial again. I guess system/line not stable enough.
Every time i call to china, my calls are disconnected in every 15 mins. I have to redial constantly. It's absolutely inconvenient. This really drop down the quality of the service.

Review.Titre: Bought my minutes over the weekend and…
Review.Contenu: Bought my minutes over the weekend and didn't receive them until today! But the money was taking out right away from my bank account! That's not right! I already had/have an account with you guys too! -Linda
Disconnected too many times especially during the first 10 minutes, it made both my mother who is 100 years old and my brother who is 78 years old very upset, otherwise it is good.

Review.Titre: Half of the times when we try to call…
Review.Contenu: Half of the times when we try to call our family members in China, the audio quality is very poor and often got disconnected.  Hope the technical department would make improvement.
my account had  little  money before Chinese new year. I  bought $5 else at  02/16.  I called dozens of minutes to china.  my account's money is 0.***
I noticed that the connection is unstable; I needed to fail a few times to get connection. Not sure what's happened.Thanks.

Review.Titre: The quality of this phone card used to…
Review.Contenu: The quality of this phone card used to be better. But over the past year there was sometimes disconnections and low quality of voice occurred.

Review.Titre: I give it three stars because the line…
Review.Contenu: I give it three stars because the line gets cutoff very frequently. Sometimes it cuts off only one minute after the call went through

Review.Titre: always take two to three trials to get…
Review.Contenu: always take two to three trials to get through, and even when the phone is not connected, it will deduct one cent for each trial.

Review.Titre: What you pay what you get
Review.Contenu: It's easy to make a call but the signal is average. The signal is not stable and often drop the call on the freeway.

Review.Titre: I always gave five stars in the past but not now ...
Review.Contenu: I always give five stars in the past, but recently my calls were discontinued at least three times per call.

Review.Titre: I bought the $5 a month plan but you do…
Review.Contenu: I bought the $5 a month plan but you do not have any access number for me rendering it useless.
The sound is not good. The noise level is very high. Last time it was better than this time.
Recently, the connection was bad. The ongoing conversation was disconnected automatically.

Review.Titre: Phone line always shots in the middle
Review.Contenu: Phone line always shots in the middle. Then I need to dial it again and again.
The talk is always stopped automatically.

Review.Titre: My phone call was often disconnected.

Review.Contenu: some time slow or cant call.
Works well most of time, except disconnected a few times.

Review.Titre: I like your system allows me to use my…
Review.Contenu: I like your system allows me to use my pre-filled money to make long distance call when it's around 85 cents left. Of course I'll refill more money to my account when no balance left but I didn't like I couldn't make phone call when my account still had 86 cents because It's enough for me to talk more than 30 minutes with 86 cents.I'm satisfied with your other service, thank you!I just want your system allows me to talk till 0 balance before I refill money again.
very good price online calling app for mobile phone. if pc version is available, it would be even batter! also, the problem of switching bluetooth to speaker automatically is very annoying...
When nobody in China picks up the phone call, DianhuaChina always deducts one minute from my account. It's unfair for DianhuaChina to do that. DianhuaChina should fix the issue.

Review.Titre: Easy and reliable but the line cut off every hour in a long call
Review.Contenu: The system is easy to use and always works. The reason I gives it a four star is that in a long phone call, the line is cut off very hour. One has to dial the number again. it's  inconvenient and very annoying.
the price is very reasonable.  great deal to call China.
It's easy to get access and the rate of price is reasonable.

Review.Titre: Otherwise perfect service with one issue.
Review.Contenu: I just hope I can add more money when the account balance is below $1. I really don't use much.

There are times, I cannot dial through to destination number from my calling number, and when contact customer service, there is no answer or solution even though the customer service representatives are very nice.

Review.Titre: This is a reliable service that I have…
Review.Contenu: This is a reliable service that I have used for many years.  The only thing I would like it to change is for at least 2 phones to have automatic dial without entering the card number, which is quite long and hard to remember (I have a cell and a land line but the card number is only recognized on cell).
Easy to use and the quality is good in most of time I used

Review.Titre: The price is very good but we still…
Review.Contenu: The price is very good but we still have issues that the call suddenly cuts off and we have to re-dial - sometimes 3 or 4 times. With the "unlimited" plan and having all our call charges included in our phone package it doesn't cost us anything extra - but it is still annoying.

No hidden fees, very reliable connections, VERY handy to have as we can also use from other places where ever we have internet connection - so not just from Home Line but also from our Mobiles.Just have to keep "checking" to find out whether they offer better deals - not brought to our attention automatically.

For a little over $5, enjoy unlimited call to China, the deal cannot be passed. The sound quality is generally better than the other phone card service sold in State. All that said, I did experience 2 times of busy signal. When I switch to the $2.88 plan before the $5.28 plan run out, they start charge me immediately.

Review.Titre: Overall is OK to good in sound quality and no hiding fee at all
Review.Contenu: Overall is OK to good in sound quality and no hiding fee at all.  Easy to register for pin free access and set up to 6 quick dialing numbers with one key process.  Also good to set up automatic charging of voice credit.  Encountered disconnection是 during calls and sometimes a sort of noisy background.

I've been using the phone service for about a year now. I have had very good luck with calls going through and clear connections. I would recommend this to anyone talking to China. This has been a good experience compared to the other Avenues I have tried in Communications with my wife in China

This website has been very useful. I use its services to recharge my Chinese phone number often to save time. I never had any problems, in my experience the credit is usually transferred to my phone anywhere between 10 minutes to 1 hour. I like the website because I don't have to go into a China Mobile store to recharge. I would like to see a loyalty program for ongoing users, not just for referrals. Overall I recommend this website if you are calling to China for using a Chinese mobile phone number.

Review.Titre: Good overall, but call disrupted by balance reminder
Review.Contenu: In general, the phone card works well. One thing needs improvement is, why when I still have 90 minutes, when I called someone, the prompted message said I needed to charge my card, and my attempts of call failed twice, though the balance is enough for 90 minutes?

Connections are most times good - but still have sudden disconnections.From Admin point - would be easier to "change" my credit card details instead of having to delete and re-enter as a new one - only change was the new expiry date.

It is a very efficient method for non Chinese citizens to top up card balances. The processing used to take a while but this has improved over the years and now takes a very short time for the funds to go through. Well recommended.

Good communication quality, reasonable fee rates, precise records of call duration. I am very satisfy of the service provided by Dianhua China. It will be perfect if it is possible to make recalls without dial the access number each time.

Review.Titre: You have served me many years
Review.Contenu: You have served me many years. I thank you very much! you have good quality services! Your price is cheap. Especially l like you auto add money from my bank! you give me more conveniences, thank you once again!

I use DianhuaChina credit calling to China. It is awesome calling, connection is very good and the fee is much lower than international call. of course, if you use [external reference], you don't need to pay your chatting.
quite reliable with occasional small transmitting problems.  It will be better if the automatic charges on my credit card are made every month on the same date (It has been a day or two earlier).

I used DianhuaChina many years, their Service Is very good. Their price is cheap. Their time counting is honest.Their Auto Recharge is convinient forCustomer. I like DianhuaChina’s services very much.

Save the time from visit the phone Card dealers in China - simply buy online from Dianhua.Yes, it will cost you additional, but with the limited cost for using a phone in China, it's really not a problem.
Dianhua China has provided a convenient, reliable service for communication. The rate is good, and stable. Had occasional interruption during call, but was not sure it was caused by it's line.

Review.Titre: Price and service availability are very…
Review.Contenu: Price and service availability are very good. Voice quality is good most of time.However, occasionally there are times when the line is too noisy or the voice quality is too poor to hear clearly.

Review.Titre: This is very reliable and crystal voice…
Review.Contenu: This is very reliable and crystal voice quality when I use to call my Oversea friends. I love it. If it add some extra  features like  text messages Then will be Even better Thanks
Having lived in China for 7 years, I have just found this method of online recharging.  Not having to go into the China Mobile store or buy and use the charging cards is great.  I love this service.

Review.Titre: SIGNAL FOR CELL PH WAS NOT VERY GOOD.

Review.Contenu: Calls are of good quality with very little hassle making a connection.  I used to use E-Call China but their quality and service deteriorated and we sought a new provider.
Everything works fine except disconnection during a call that might last more than 30 minutes.  Also, the passcode is only recognized by one number instead of two.

Review.Titre: Most times there are no problems in …
Review.Contenu: Most times there are no problems in making a call and call quality is most of the times pretty good too. Much better than many other "VOIP suppliers" we have tried

Review.Titre: when first signed up and service was…
Review.Contenu: when first signed up and service was pretty good and price was great. However, somehow, after a while, the minutes went down faster than it actually should be...

Review.Titre: slight delay in reception in China
Review.Contenu: I use Dianhua china to call my parents or friends in China once or twice a week. The general quality of reception is good. However, they got a slight delay in hearing my voice.

Review.Titre: Most time the connection is fine but…
Review.Contenu: Most time the connection is fine but sometimes even I entered the right password the system  still tell me I have entered wrong one then get hung up.
Your service is good and connecting time is reasonable. But for some reason, may be it's not your problem, the connection is not very clear sometimes.
It is a good service I believe. Cheap, convenient. Just sometimes it was not so stable or clearly, but over all, it is a very good service.
Good monthly subscription with fixed price - but strength of connection sometimes not so good - have to call back again and again.

Review.Titre: It is a cost effective way to make …
Review.Contenu: It is a cost effective way to make overseas calls. Sometimes it does not connect and you have to dial again. Overall, I am satisfied.

Review.Titre: when I talk on my phone after 3ms will…
Review.Contenu: when I talk on my phone after 3ms will stop,it happens every time. I need start again. so I only can give 4 *.
A bit expensive compared to purchasing locally however it is extremely convenient to recharge a domestic phone while in China.

Review.Titre: I used Diadnhau for three years
Review.Contenu: I used Diadnhau for three years. The service is meet my expectation. Call to China have no problem even on holiday.
Your production is good. But some times your production doesn't work when I exchange a phone, I don't why.
Once a while, the connection was not good. Wish that both my cell and home phone can skip the password.
The connection is much better than before. I don't get any drop call during recent months. Keep up!
Low cost, easy to use, fast and reliable connection, although the voice quality could be better.
Cost is very low. The voice quality is poor sometime. Has to try several dials to get connection
Recharged 3 times since Jan. Although dropped call once a while, overall this is a good preduct
to whom it may concern,Why do you only allow two hours calling ? Then to dial again ?
Has cheap rates to China and usually calls are clear.  However, calls don't always go through.
I have been using Dianhuachina for a long time, never had any problem with it. Great service!

Review.Titre: Only weakness is the design of your website.

good quality calling and cheap price. the best thing is that the balance never expire.

most of the time it works well, although sometimes I experienced dropped calls

overall it is good, bad signal at rush time, especially at big holiday

easy to purchase, and easy to call cointries around the world

it's great website. offer good services in low prices

Good service with all questions answered.
good rate with good quality service.
it is good for using the phonecard.

Review.Contenu: I love it. Great price, good service.
Works good. Thanks
But your Ad. is not very convenient.

Review.Titre: I gave a good comment to this app.

Review.Contenu: Good but free resource everywhere

Review.Titre: I have used $5 per month for free…
Review.Contenu: I have used $5 per month for free calling in Dianhuachina.com for two or three years because my elderly parents can use traditional phone only. My father passed away at his 94 years old. My mom is 90 now. The line is always in good quality and never have any problem since I used it.
